about:
I am an activist, in real life and on the forums. I am not afraid to point out what i think is wrong and that has made  me both friends and enemies. Again both in real life and on the forums. I have participated in several online protests and activist rallies, and i may have a group of my own...but we don't need to know about that, do we? Nope. Aaaanyways. I am strongly against pirating, as it is no different then stealing, and that is a moral i will stick to forever. Although if a friend pirates an ea game, only ea, i may turn a blind eye. On avicus i do a lot of killing and i am part of the team " immunity"  (the bestest team around). On the forums i make a ton of suggestions and draw controversy and trolls. I recently decided to start a list of people who have hated on me so its small because i dont really update it much.  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Graveyard:
R.I.P. KizzyFizzy: A great forum user and a great person. She had a rather strict self-control rule book, and was never afraid to speak her mind, KizzyFizzy finally died because her mom said she could no longer play. Goodbye KizzyFizzy, you will be missed.
